fulltext:
RESUME 
• 
PERSONAL IMFOMATION 
Full name: NGO QUOC THUAN 
Address: 16, 152 Cao Lo Str., Ward 4, Dist. 8, HCMC, Vietnam. 
Date of birth:  21 /06 /1990. 
Gender: Male. 
Marital status:  Single. 
Phone number: 035 959 6262. 
Email: thuanngo1990@gmail.com 
• 
OCCUPATION OBJECTIVE 
- 
I wish to have a good opportunity to work in a professional working environment where I could 
make a significant contribution and develop my specialist knowledge and foreign language skills. 
- 
I’d like to become an excellent computer programmer. I am willing to learn more and more to 
improve myself. 
- 
I want to get more experience and learn more about mobile application programming, especially 
mobile programming on IOS OS, to be master IOS developer. Beside, I wish to improve my Android 
OS skill. 
• 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
- 
Jun, 2017  –  Now:  
RobustTechHouse Company. 
§ 
Working on “Tuansing” project (IOS) – A real estate application.  
o Members: 3. 
o Role: Leader. Main IOS developer. 
o Technical:  Swift 3, Rest-Json, Google nearby places, Firebase…. 
o Link App: https://itunes.apple.com/US/app/id1287360662?mt=8 
§ 
Participated the group of “Gohji” project on IOS (2 Apps) - A shopping, deal 
application. 
o Members: 6. 
o Role: Main IOS developer.  
o Technical: Swift 3.2, Rest-Json, Custom UI, Google map, Firebase…. 
o Link App: Still UAT (available in TestFlight).  
§ 
Participated the group of “Redeem Now” project on IOS - A shopping, gift, deal 
application. 
o Members: 4.  
o Role: Maintenance, Fixing UAT, New function.  
o Technical: Swift 4, Rest-Json, Firebase, MVVM-Rxswift, Stripe payment…. 
o Link app: Waiting for publish (available in TestFlight). 
§ 
Participated the group of  “D-Ron” project on Android (2 apps) - A shopping, 
booking meal application. 
o Members: 3.  
o Role: Main coder.  
o Technical: Kotlin, Rest-Json, Firebase, Android architecture components, Stripe 
payment…. 
o Link app:  Waiting for client publishing. 
§ 
Participated the group of “TicketTrust” project on Android - A booking ticket 
application. 
o Members: 3.  
o Role: Main coder.  
o Technical: Kotlin , Rest-Json, Firebase, Android architecture components, Stripe 
payment, Paypal…. 
o Link app:  Still UAT.  
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
- 
Jun, 2016 – Jun, 2017 :  
VNIB Tech (Innerbus) Company. 
§ Participated the group of  “Innerbean” project on IOS -  A chatting application for 
working  - CORPORATE SOCIAL NETWORK.  
o Members: more than 10 members.   
o Role: Maintenance. Fix feedback. New function.  
o Technical:  Swift 2, Socket IO, Realm DB, Rest-Json, …. 
o Link app: (waiting for publish). 
§ Fixed bug the project of “Innerbean” on Andoird OS.  
o Members: more than 10 members.  
o Role: Maintenance. Fix feedback. 
o Technical: Java, Socket IO, Realm DB, Rest-Json….  
o https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.innerbeans30 (beta version). 
§ Outsourcing: “Jhook” App (User and Client) on IOS –  The application use map to show 
your service : make up, nails, massage…   just like Uber app.   
o Members: 3 
o Role: Maintenance. New function. 
o Technical: Swift 3, Rest-Json, Mapkit, Firebase…. 
o Link app:  (waiting for publish). 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Nov, 2015 – April 2016 :  
BraveSoft VN Company. 
§ The main coder with the project of “FM- Net” on iOS. (Making a playlist music and 
pre scheduled recording for the future) 
o Members: 1 
o Role: main coder.  
o Technical: Swift 2.0, Reaml DB, Amazon S3, REST-JSON, IOS API.... 
(Outsourcing – Don’t have link app strore). 
§ Research Swift 2, making a seminar about Swift.  
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
April, 2015 – October 2015  
Cungmua & Nhommua Company.  
§ Fix bug the project of “Cung mua” and “GreenBag” on Andoird OS.  
o Members: 4 
o https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cungmua.app. 
§ Participated the group of  “GreenBag” -  A fresh food shopping online application on 
IOS. 
o Members: 6 
o Technical: Swift 1.2, REST, JSON, IOS API, Auto Layout.... 
o https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/greenbag-i-cho-online/id1046831691?mt=8 
o  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=greenbag.customer 
§ Participated the group of “Cung mua” new application with new technology of Swift 
language on IOS OS. 
o Members: 4 
o Technical: Swift 1.2, REST, JSON, IOS API, Auto Layout.... 
o  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cung-mua-mua-sam-voi-gia-uu-
ai/id833357298?mt=8 
- 
- 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
- 
Sep, 2013 – April, 2015 :  
FPT Telecom Company (RAD Department).  
§ From 04/2014, my position is the main coder with the project of “Fshare” on Android 
OS. 
o Members: more than 20 members. 
o Role: Android developer. 
o https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fsharemobile&hl=vi 
§ I am one of the members with the project of “FPT Play”. 
o Members: more than 10 members. 
o Role: Android developer. 
o https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fplay.activity&hl=vi 
§ Research “Voice over IP” (open source CsipSimple) with the project of FPT Voice HD 
o Members: 4. 
o Role: Android developer. 
• 
EDUCATION 
Name of university 
Major 
Training 
Course 
Term  Years  GPA 
Saigon Technology University Computer Science 
College 
2008-2011 
3 
7,04 
Saigon Technology University Computer Science 
Successive 
System Into 
Regular 
University 
2011-2013  1,5  8,38 
(attachment below) 
• 
SOME PROJECTS (AT UNIVERSITY) 
- 
Thesis " Motorbike Store Management" in 2011. 
1. Programming language : C++. 
2. DB:  SQL Server. 
3. Result: 8,1đ. 
4. Position: Team leader (3 members). 
- 
Thesis " Call & Messaging Management On Android OS." in 2013. 
1. Programming language: Java/Android. 
2. DB : SQLite. 
3. Result: 8.9đ. 
4. Position : Team leader (2 members) 
Playing the team leader role in all projects as setting software on windows, designing 
website… 
- 
• 
ACHIEVEMENT AND EXTRACURRICULAR  ACTIVITIES 
Salutatorian of the inter-college transfer university 2013. 
Joined the football game "STU Dormitory" in 2008. Awarded top scorer. 
Joined the football game of Information Technology Department at STU, which was held annually from 
2008 to 2012. Awarded 1st prize in 2012. 
11/2014, Won the Championship in football game with RAD and EPZ  at FPT TelecomTan Thuan. 
08/2015, Won the Championship in football game with IT Team at CungMua Company. Awarded top 
scorer 
- 
- 
- 
- 
- 
• 
CERTIFICATE 
- 2009-2010: learning English communication courses at VIET-UC foreign language center (level: 
Intermediate).  
- 2017-2018: learning English communication courses at VIET-UC foreign language center (level: Upper - 
Intermediate). 
- Attachment: 
          https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B4hd97gPuFpoYl9fRUhFaVM0NFE&usp=sharig . 
With my knowledge and experience, I believe that I will meet your recruitment needs . Should 
you wish to arrange a personal interview, I am willing to come to your office at a time 
convenient to you.  
I  sincerely thank you! 
                                                                                  Ho Chi Minh City, 23 Dec 2018.
